document.full_text: pakistani security forces shot dead five suspected al qaeda-linked chechen militants who had tried to carry out a suicide bombing in the southwestern city of quetta on tuesday, police and paramilitary officials said.
document.title: pakistani forces kill five suspected suicide bombers
lines_and_colors: pakistani security forces shot dead five suspected al qaeda-linked chechen militants who had tried to carry out a suicide bombing in the southwestern city of quetta on tuesday, police and paramilitary officials said.
